transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji. Haan Imtiaz sahab namaskar. To Himanshu baat kar raha hu sir business manager IndiaMART se kaise hain?
Executive: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Sir parso meri baat hui thi aapse Rajkumar ne gaya tha.
Customer: [unintelligible] IndiaMART se sir.
Customer: [unintelligible] thodi hai wo. Haan haan bataiye bataiye.
Executive: Ji ji ji to ye sir TrustSeal ke liye unhone do saal ka aapko diya tha discount vagera karke sir isko kar dete hain. Jo bhi price diya hai na sir agar aap karte ho aaj sir to closing bhi chal rahi hai month end hai aapka kuch additional aur price mein jo bhi final diya usse bhi best kar deta hu aapke liye sir.
Customer: Ek baat to bataiye wo to aap kar denge aapki baat thik hai lekin abhi jo liya hua hai usme to ek aadha order karwaiye.
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Abhi jo humne package liya hua hai usme to kuch ek aadhi lead dhang ki bhejiye.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Wo to aap aur paise deke karwa rahe hain hamara kaam abhi jo paise gaye hue hain wo bhi to paise hi hain usme to karaiye kuch.
Customer: Usme ye samajh lo aapka na abhi lagbhag mere khayal se teen mahine ke aas pass ho gaye.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ab tak usme hai na ek bhi genuine banda nahi aaya ek bhi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Koi to koi to chaat ki bhatti mang raha koi chaat ki theli mang raha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Koi do counter mang raha steel ke gol gappe bechne ke liye.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aap achha khud batao 37 40 hazar rupaye man lo kharch hue aapke usme to usme kuch to dikhna chahiye na hume jabhi to hum aage paise lagane ke liye hume achha lagega.
Executive: Hmm. Main samajh gaya but ek cheez dekhiye na Saharanpur mein Saharanpur mein matlab almost sare matlab mere main kam se kam 20 25 logo ko matlab TrustSeal hamare chal rahe honge jo mere pass Saharanpur se hi ho gaya.
Customer: Hai nahi matlab meri team mein jaise itne sare log kaam karte hain to main around mere pass 200 2000 3000 2000 3000 client hai mere pass thik hai. 2000 3000 mere pass client hai to usme se Saharanpur ke kitne hai na usme TrustSeal kam se kam 20 25 log honge aur sath mein uske abhi recently teen mahine mein main teen char logo ko maximizer tak diya hai to sir itna competition sir itna bhi hai na sir to milega sir ek saal ki service li aapne milega but at least agar apna TrustSeal mein hota to kam se kam wo top 20 hai waha pe to dikhe TrustSeal certificate ye aapko Rajkumar ne bataya hoga aur uske accordingly hoga ye bas itna hi kehna chah raha hu.
Executive: Ji ji meri baat hui thi Rajkumar ji se bhi. Ji ji ji ji. Achha meri baat suniye Saharanpur mein aapka koi banda hai jo hamare se hamare se yaha pe mil le.
Executive: Nahi sir video meeting hi dekho jo head office se jo handling hoti hai wo head office se hi hota hai sir to jyada sab kuch online hi hota hai to aapko milne to koi nahi jayega ha but yaha pe aapko jo bhi concern hai video meeting kar lijiye hum aapko explain kar denge agar jarurat meri padi to main bhi aa jaunga join kar lunga.
Customer: Wo to aapki baat hi hai.
Executive: Kar lijiye sir. Dekho milna milna milke to wahi cheez bataunga sir seedhe aap kar lijiye sir main achhe se achhe aapko benefit karwaunga aur result bhi hai is services mein itna main aapko commit karta hu.
Customer: Sir ye dekho aap meri baat suno agar aap hai na main to jyada nahi aapse bas ek do hi lead dhang ki mang raha tha kyuki usi mein hi kya hai na hamara setup start ho jata kaam ka ab tak aapko main baat batau wo jo bhaiya aaye the jinse humne wo liya tha na package vagera uske baad se leke na hum jab se yahi soch rahe the ke ek ek do order aa jaye to ek ek setup lag jayega kaam ka matlab jaisa machinery vagera la ke rakhi hai na humne to ek setup lag jayega start ho jayega kaam.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Uske baad me to aap TrustSeal keh rahe hain to koi dikkat nahi wo bhi kara lenge usme kya dikkat hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: To thoda aap isme isme thoda aap isme hume support kijiye wo to hum kara lenge.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Kis mein kara lo kya ab mere se kya hai kya help chahiye wo bataiye sir aap.
Customer: Main aapse ye kehna chah raha hu hamare pass jo leads aa rahi hain wo achhi nahi aa rahi hain.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Usme koi bhi client is confirm aapko buylead hi nahi pahunch rahi hai sir.
Executive: Haan wo bilkul finally koi bhi customer nahi hai usme finally wala jo final kare. Ha nahi nahi final me to final wala to kisi bhi nahi aapko final wala to nahi dete hain but priority bhi hoti hai jaise abhi catering counter mein hamare pass 1222 generate hota hai ek hafte ek mahine mein sir wedding sofa mein 500 living room sach mein 300 two seater sofa mein 100 aur sofa chair mein 80 but aapko pahunch hi nahi wo sold ho jata ek buylead ko panch log hi dekhte hain to priority wise listing wise wo chala jata hai to ye difference hota hai sir.
Executive: To isliye main aapse keh raha hu ki agar usme karate ho na aapko nuksan to nahi hone dunga itna aapko guaranteed deta hu sir thik hai.
Customer: Chalo ye ye batao ye aapka personally number hai.
Executive: Ji main bhi apna jo aapko diya hai na sir price matlab Rajkumar ne usse bhi less main karke agar mere level pe baat aayi hai aise call leta nahi hai sir aa gayi hai to main aapko price aur achha karke de dunga sir.
Customer: Ye ye main aapko fir is bare mein na do din ke samay ke baad bataunga aap mujhe koi personally number dijiye jisme direct yahi baat ho aapke pass.
Executive: Nahi baat to ho jayegi matlab number to main hi uthaunga call thik hai usme koi kis naam se karni hai baat.
Customer: Himanshu Himanshu thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Khud to usme koi problem nahi hai but wahi cheez hai na sir closing hai to main price mein bol raha tha ki main de deta thoda bahut achha karke.
Customer: Price to hum kam hi karayenge aapse tension na lo aap.
Executive: Sir isliye to kam sab abhi to karaunga aap price negotiate nahi hoga sir fir.
Customer: Mujhe abhi do din ka samay chahiye main do din ke baad aapse ye kaam karaunga.
Executive: Sir main max isko Friday tak parso ha thik hai parso tak main aapko hold kar pa paunga usse jyada nahi sir.
Customer: Haan koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Parso kitne baje call kar lo aapko.
Customer: Main hi kar lunga sir aapko jarurat hi nahi padegi.
Executive: Nahi aise main aapko lekin main aapko ek last cheez hai na Friday hai sir Friday hai to aap matlab us din to jumme wale din rehta hai to aap available rahoge nahi.
Customer: Hamari chutti nahi rehti hai meri baat suniye aap main aapko ye ye wala hum aap jo keh rahe hain na isko TrustSeal karane ke liye wo kara lenge hum kharcha varcha to do char hazar rupaye niche karke bhi kar denge lekin usme na aapko ye hamara kaam jarur karna padega usme hume genuine bande chahiye ye guarantee aapki rahegi.
Executive: Thik hai done hai.
Customer: Hai na done hai sir done hai thik hai thik hai main aapko isi topic ke aage se main aapko Friday mein baat karunga.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai matlab wo Friday ko koi time to bata dijiye main available rahunga aur call ya to aap call kar lena main kar lenge.
Customer: Kitne baje morning mein first aapne.
Executive: Na na do teen baje ke aas pass thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai thik thik hai sir thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants genuine buyleads in current package.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of leads received.

- Wants a local contact in Saharanpur.



Resolution:

- Executive assured better leads and support.

- Offered a better price for TrustSeal subscription.

- Executive will provide support via video meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will decide in two days.

- Executive to follow up on Friday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Negative | Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, subscription, follow up
